text: WATCH: ‘We basically have no clients,’ says Zhu Yuan, the chairman of Romen's Wedding Dress, where dozens of embellished ivory dresses were crammed against each other on clothing racks https://t.co/ErvY59qF3q https://t.co/33m2yNnr61

name: Reuters
text: About 1,000 people joined a mile-long march in Kenosha, Wisconsin, chanting ‘Black lives matter’ and ‘No justice, no peace’ as National Guard units stood by to prevent a resurgence of violence that rocked the city earlier in the week https://t.co/Pwf8sZfg5a https://t.co/P9hrkXbpUX
